release_notes.en-US:
updated validation signatures, and make sure when your installing to firefox or thunderbird have the right version 
this one only works with 
FF. 1-4.0.* currently and
thunderbird 1-3.2apre beta currently

the stuff shown is my person stuff for 'my' auto paste and is used an an example and is not to be
taken for granite, you must make your own tabs, sorry

description.en-US: Makes everyday entries to forms and forums simpler! Add a signature with just a right-click of the mouse and select 'Add Signature' from the context menu. (Please, note: What you see in the picture is only an example. It is my personal auto-paste and is not meant to be copied. Sorry, you have to make your own tabs. ) Real Users Reviews: "I love this add-on simply because I can make several signatures, edit them and use them everywhere. I'm a crafter, writer and artist who is all over the web, and many sites/forums don't allow formatting signatures. "This add-on is saving me so much time. I really appreciate it." ThePaperLady http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Internet-Utilities/Signature-for-Thunderbird.shtml Signature for Thunderbird 4.1 - SOFTPEDIA "100% CLEAN" AWARD This product was last tested in the Softpedia Labs on 03 February 2010 by Olivia Irinescu Softpedia guarantees that Signature for Thunderbird 4.1 is 100% Clean, which means it does not contain any form of malware, including but not limited to: spyware, viruses, trojans and backdoors. This software product was tested thoroughly and was found absolutely clean; therefore, it can be installed with no concern by any computer user. However, it should be noted that this product will be retested periodically and the award may be withdrawn, so you should check back occasionally and pay attention to the date of testing shown above.
